abstract: H J Heinz says it is launching new ketchup flavor that includes popular red Thai hot sauce Sriracha.
lead_paragraph: Sriracha’s ingredients include chili pepper paste, garlic and vinegar. Taco Bell and Pizza Hut also have plans to include Sriracha flavoring.

headline.main: Heinz Wants to Capture Heat of Sriracha for New Ketchup
headline.print_headline: Heinz Wants to Capture Heat of Sriracha for New Ketchup

snippet: Sriracha’s ingredients include chili pepper paste, garlic and vinegar. Taco Bell and Pizza Hut also have plans to include Sriracha flavoring.
